results.title: Lisinopril-Induced Liver Injury: An Unusual Presentation and Literature Review
results.journal: Eur J Case Rep Intern Med
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@-Induced @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@Liver Injury@@@: An Unusual Presentation and Literature Review

citations.NLM: Al-Rifaie A, Khan MA, Ali A, Dube AK, Gleeson D, Hoeroldt B. Lisinopril-Induced Liver Injury: An Unusual Presentation and Literature Review Eur J Case Rep Intern Med. 2020;7(7):001600. PMID: 32665926

results.title: Delayed drug-induced liver injury (DILI) and flare of chronic plaque psoriasis secondary to lisinopril use.
results.text_hl: There is limited information available regarding the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@hepatic failure@@@ secondary to @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ use, with a handful of case reports demonstrating @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@drug-induced liver injury@@@ at varying time scales from drug initiation.

citations.NLM: Jarman GL, Webb GJ. Delayed drug-induced liver injury (DILI) and flare of chronic plaque psoriasis secondary to lisinopril use. BMJ Case Rep. 2024 Jan 23;17(1):. PMID: 38262719
citations.BibTeX: @article{38262719, title={Delayed drug-induced liver injury (DILI) and flare of chronic plaque psoriasis secondary to lisinopril use.}, author={Jarman GL and Webb GJ}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={17}, number={1}}

results.title: Fulminant hepatitis after lisinopril administration.
results.text_hl: This case strongly suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ may induce acute @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatitis@@@ and that continuation of the treatment after the onset of @DISEASE_Jaundice @DISEASE_MESH:D007565 @@@jaundice@@@ can lead to life-threatening @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@hepatic failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Larrey D, Babany G, Bernuau J, Andrieux J, Degott C, Pessayre D, Benhamou JP. Fulminant hepatitis after lisinopril administration. Gastroenterology. 1990 Dec;99(6):1832-3. PMID: 2172073
citations.BibTeX: @article{2172073, title={Fulminant hepatitis after lisinopril administration.}, author={Larrey D and Babany G and Bernuau J and Andrieux J and Degott C and Pessayre D and Benhamou JP}, journal={Gastroenterology}, volume={99}, number={6}, pages={1832-3}}
